levels.description: This unit's Trait changes to losing <@ba.vdown>{hp_ratio:0%}</> HP every second. Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as <@ba.vup>True damage</> to all enemies within range every second (damage from this unit and the Seaborn stacks). All ally units within range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to <@ba.vup>{atk:0%}</> of this unit's ATK
